Actions.Name: Assign Role (Roles)
Actions.Description: Assign user specified role that is applicable to a specific record. An example of this would be a document reviewer or a leave approver

Actions.Name: Execute (BPM)
Actions.Description: Submits an option in its current workflow step. Depending on the business rules, the record wil be progressed to the next step in the process and return information about the next step to the calling api

Actions.Name: Execute (Templates)
Actions.Description: Processes and returns a Template from Agilit-e based on the 'profile-key' provided

Actions.Name: Generate Number (Numbering)
Actions.Description: Generates a unique number based on 'profile-key' provided

Actions.Name: Get Assigned Roles (Roles)
Actions.Description: Get responsible person(s) for previously assigned role for a specific record

Actions.Name: Get By Profile Key (BPM)
Actions.Description: Get the full BPM Profile with configuration and options for the process.

Actions.Name: Get Record State (BPM)
Actions.Description: Get BPM Record State for one or more records to include the current status, who is responsible for the record, the workflow history and other information to describe the current state and rules for the record

Actions.Name: Get Profile Keys By Group (Keywords)
Actions.Description: Returns all Keyword profile keys based on the 'group-name' provided

Actions.Name: Get By Profile Key (Keywords)
Actions.Description: Returns Key/Value pairs of a specific Keyword profile based on the 'profile-key' provided

Actions.Name: Get Label By Value (Keywords)
Actions.Description: Returns a Keyword Label based on the 'profile-key' and 'value-key' provided

Actions.Name: Get Value By Label (Keywords)
Actions.Description: Returns a Keyword Value based on the 'profile-key' and 'label-key' provided

Actions.Name: Get Role (Roles)
Actions.Description: Get responsible person(s) that are assigned to roles in the Agilit-e admin portal. These roles are not only relevant to specific records or business processes and are more typically used for company wide roles in the organization

Actions.Name: Register BPM Record (BPM)
Actions.Description: Register new BPM Record. The record is assigned with a recordID that is used for the record life cycle to identify the record, it's progress, history and status at all time
